title: Blue Moon Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Blue Moon Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Ice
2
ounces
high-quality
gin
1/2
ounce
Creme de Violette
1/2
ounce
freshly squeezed lemon juice
Garnish:
lemon twist
Directions
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add gin, crème de violette, and lemon juice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.
Special Equipment
Cocktail shaker
,
strainer
